Organics:
 
"No," the valkyrie said,"you cannot fight.  For now, you must take care of your child.  Leave the fighting to me."
Organics drew her massive sword and donned her shield.  She lifted off the ground and opened the door.  She left the med lab and shut and locked the door.  She opened a comm channel to Nightlight, so they may stay in constant contact.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Sedna/Elita:

When Organics saw her after she have done all those stuff, Sedna had 
in her arms the Little Elite, who reconized mom's scent and was 
purring and laughting hapilly in her arms, "do ya miss me lil 
one"said the femme with a smile"I missed you too, my sweetone"and 
looking to Organics she said "They are tought ones... due that I 
must leave the base and fight against them... for Elita's safely... 
but I like to be sure that anithing will happen hert"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Organics:
>  
> The femme releases the energy field restraining Nightlight.  She 
then goes over to the med bay doors and shuts them, locking them.  
It would be their safe room of sorts.  She leans againt a counter 
and pulls the massive Chaos Breaker sword from her back.  She begins 
checking it, to be sure it was ready if she needed it.  Satisfied, 
she replaces it in the findings on her back, and turns to the 
shorter femme.
> "I hope the boys can take care of the minions.  I hear they are 
tough to beat."
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Still are a energy filed that will be needed to be removed in 
> order to she will be free.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Organics:
> >  
> > "I don't know if I should release you, I am in no position to 
make 
> desicions.  But yes, there is a battle outside.  Malice, Rodimus, 
> Black Fang, and a few others are fighting what appear to be 
> Unicron's minions."
> > She walked toward the table and set Elita down at the edge, and 
> positioned the table so Nightlight could set up and released her 
> forearms.
> 
>
